Posted By: Kryptnyt (2/1/2011 4:28:14 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
King Arthur: You fight with the strength of many men, Sir Knight.   
![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)   
King Arthur: I am Arthur, King of the Britons.   
   
King Arthur: I seek the bravest and the finest knights in the land who will join me in my court at Camelot.   
   
King Arthur: You have proved yourself worthy. Will you join me?   
   
King Arthur: You make me sad. So be it. Come, Patsy!   
![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)   
Black Knight: None shall pass.   
King Arthur: What?   
Black Knight: None shall pass!   
King Arthur: I have no quarrel with you, good Sir Knight. But I must cross this bridge.   
Black Knight: Then you shall die.   
King Arthur: I command you, as King of the Britons, to stand aside!   
Black Knight: I move for no man.   
King Arthur: So be it!   
![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)   
King Arthur: Now, stand aside, worthy adversary!   
Black Knight: 'Tis but a scratch!   
King Arthur: A scratch? Your arm's off!   
Black Knight... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Black Knight: Then you shall die.
King Arthur: I command you, as King of the Britons, to stand aside!
Black Knight: I move for no man.

Black Knight: 'Tis but a scratch!
King Arthur: A scratch? Your arm's off!

posts.post_content: 5/5, easily one of my favorite cards. Artwork is amazing and the flavor is outstanding. I just wish they dragged the text through the years... First Strike to nearly any opposing knight (PROT from White makes that even more possible) and just slaps away a ton of Black removal.

Posted By: Totema (11/8/2011 11:13:49 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Black Knight you are a beast! You eat [ball lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=ball lightning)s for breakfast, laugh at [doom blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=doom blade) or [terror](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=terror), and give the middle finger to Whitey, all for 2 black mana. Wizards please keep him and his white brother around for future players. In this case, reprints are always welcome.   
  
\*The Monty Python and the holy grail shout outs put a smile on my face.
posts.html:

*The Monty Python and the holy grail shout outs put a smile on my face.

posts.post_content: Ive always played white faithfully.... Trying to resist the call of black magic... This guy is the reason I built my first black deck.... Well after beating my face in a few times that is... I'll be the first to admit... This guy has been a thorn in my side since 1996... But, I can't deny his ability.... A solid 4/5 in my book....

posts.post_content: Being black means he's immune to many black removal spells. Protection from white saves him from all the white single-target removals. i.e., survival wise Black Knight is stronger then White Knight, although White Knight is in the color of weenie enhancements.
